![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Astrid-EXIT.png)

**Yahoo! acquired Todoroo, Inc.**

In May 2013 Yahoo! Inc. acquired TMT’s portfolio company Todoroo, Inc. (Astrid app). 

[Read More](https://tmtinvestments.com/announcements/acquisition-of-todoroo-inc-2/)

![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Vital-Fields-EXIT.png)

**Monsanto acquired Vital Fields**

In November 2016 The Climate Corporation, a subsidiary of Monsanto Company, acquired TMT’s portfolio company VitalFields. 

[Read More](https://tmtinvestments.com/announcements/disposal-of-investment-in-vitalfields/)

![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/FriendlyData-EXIT.png)

**TMT’s Quickest Exit**

In July 2018, TMT invested US$100K in FriendlyData – a natural language search interface for enterprise data. In October 2018, it was acquired by ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW). 

![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Praktika_Reval.png)

  * Investment: US$400K in 2023
  * Latest fair value: US$5M as of June 2024 
  * **Increase** : **12.5x**



![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Bolt-Revaluation-1.png)

  * Investment: US$320K in 2014 
  * Latest fair value: US$70M as of June 2024
  * **Increase** : **218x**



![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Pipedrive-Revaluation_1.png)

  * Investment: US$780K in 2012-2013
  * In November 2020 entire stake sold to Vista Equity Partners for US$41M
  * **Increase** : **51x**



![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/PandaDoc_revaluation.png)

  * Investment: US$400K in 2014 
  * Latest fair value: US$10M as of June 2024 (including cash received to date)
  * **Increase** : **25x**



![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Wrike-Revaluation_1.png)

  * Investment: US$1M in 2012 
  * Total cash exit proceeds to date US$23.4M ( In December 2018 entire stake sold to Vista Equity Partners for US$22.6M) 
  * **Increase** : **23x**



![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Workiz-Revaluation.png)

**TMT’s Quickest Exit**

In July 2018, TMT invested US$100K in FriendlyData – a natural language search interface for enterprise data. In October 2018, it was acquired by ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW).

  * Investment: US$400K in 2023
  * Latest fair value: US$5M as of June 2024 
  * **Increase** : **12.5x**



![](https://tmtinvestments.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Bolt-Revaluation-1.png)

  * Investment: US$320K in 2014 
  * Latest fair value: US$70M as of June 2024
  * **Increase** : **218x**
